content.text:
[Verse]
         [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch]                 [ch]Bm[/ch]
I could stay awake just to hear you breathing,
            [ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]D[/ch]
Watch you smile while you are sleeping,
               [ch]Em[/ch]           
While you are far away and dreaming,
          [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]A[/ch]             [ch]Bm[/ch]
I could spend my life in this sweet surrender,
          [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]
I could stay lost in this moment forever,
               [ch]F#m[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]             [ch]A[/ch]
Every moment spent with you is a moment I treasure,

[Chorus]
    [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]A[/ch]         [ch]Em[/ch]
I don't wanna close my eyes,
               
I don't wanna fall asleep,
         [ch]G[/ch]
Cause I miss you baby,
       [ch]A[/ch]                       [ch]D[/ch]
And I don't wanna miss a thing,
                   [ch]A[/ch]            [ch]Em[/ch]
Cause even when I dream of you,
                         
The sweetest dream will never do,
           [ch]G[/ch]
I still miss you baby
            [ch]A[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch] [ch]A[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]
And I don't wanna miss a thing

[Verse]
        [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]A[/ch]                  [ch]Bm[/ch]
Lying close to you feeling your heart beating,
       [ch]G[/ch]                        [ch]D[/ch]
And I wondering what you are dreaming,
          [ch]Em[/ch]                   
Wondering if it's me you are seeing,
        [ch]D[/ch]                   [ch]A[/ch]                [ch]Bm[/ch]
Then I kiss your eyes and thank God we're together,
                [ch]G[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch]                  [ch]A[/ch]
I just want to stay with you in this moment forever, forever and ever

[Chorus]
     [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]A[/ch]         [ch]Em[/ch]
I don't wanna close my eyes,
               
I don't wanna fall asleep,
         [ch]G[/ch]
Cause I miss you baby,
       [ch]A[/ch]                       [ch]D[/ch]
And I don't wanna miss a thing,
                   [ch]A[/ch]            [ch]Em[/ch]
Cause even when I dream of you,
                         
The sweetest dream will never do,
           [ch]G[/ch]
I still miss you baby
            [ch]A[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]
And I don't wanna miss a thing

[Bridge]
                   [ch]C[/ch]
And I don't wanna miss one smile,
                [ch]G[/ch]
I don't wanna miss one kiss,

[Verse]
               [ch]Bb[/ch]
I just want to be with you right here with you,
           [ch]F[/ch]
Right here just like this,
               [ch]C[/ch]
I just want to hold you close,
                      [ch]G[/ch]
I feel your heart so close to mine
          [ch]Dm[/ch]
And just stay here in this moment,
             [ch]A[/ch]
For all the rest of time, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeeeaaah

[Outro]
    [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]A[/ch]          [ch]Em[/ch]
I don't wanna close my eyes,
                [ch]G[/ch]          
I don't wanna fall asleep, yeah
       [ch]A[/ch]                   [ch]D[/ch]
And I don't wanna miss a thing

I have been searching for a version of this song to teach to my guitar students 
and came across a brilliant acoustic version on YouTube by Robert Balconi. I have 
simply worked out the chords he is playing from watching the video. If you wish to 
play along with Robert’s version from YouTube you will need a Capo on the 4th 
fret, otherwise you can ditch it or place it wherever it suits your vocal. And for 
the ‘chord experts’ out there, I know the [ch]G/F#[/ch] I have described is actually a [ch]G/F#[/ch] 
Major 7th Suspended 2nd but I did not want to continually write that. Enjoy.

music was arranged for piano/vocal/ guitar, which means the fingerings for
the guitar chords are completely off.  Use your favorite chord dictionary
to find the right fingerings.  

"|" stands for the bar line between measures.  There are two chords to a 
measure for most of this song.  For the intro, alternate between the chord
and the bass note C.
